Meer weergevenMinder weergeven · Vertalen

Naix arrived Naix was just added to Dota 2. I think there are now about 59-60 heroes. I guess that there will be no release until all "old" 104 heroes and at least a new one are part of Dota 2. Btw.: the more follower we get, the more likely we will receive some beta keys by Icefrog ;) So share this fan page with your friends and collegues.﻿

Meer weergevenMinder weergeven · Vertalen

Burnt Offerings That's the title for the new patch rolled out today! The new patch adds Warlock and includes some little changes in the reporting system of Dota 2. There are also alot of bugfixes on heroes and items. The patch also adds the possibility to choose a region (USA, Asia, Europe,..) in the match making system. There are just to many changes to list them all. You can get the whole changelog from the link below. Tell us, what hero you are still missing on Dota? The link below takes you to a hero list.
Changelog: http://bit.ly/sEqQeT Hero list: http://bit.ly/vlJft8﻿
Meer lezen (10 regels)Minder weergeven
